column3:
â€œTriangle Kush is the perfect strain for those seeking old school cannabis flavor with heavy heady effects. 

We picked up a fresh batch of Triangle Kush grown by Herban Tribe at our favorite mainland dispensary Amazon Organics and were extremely impressed!

Clocking in @ %28.97 THC and %0.09 CBD Triangle Kush will cure what ails you.

Our 'Ohana can't wait for our next visit to Amazon Organics, the legend of professi...â€
â€œ4.5  Fun strain.  Puts you in a ridiculously good mood.  Relaxing but not necessarily a complete knockout.  Try to suppress the blissful smile on your face.....you can't.  I'd buy it again.â€

â€œi give it a B++ 
good 4 back pain 
good for relaxing and anxiety 
first hit you feel the effects throughout the bodyâ€

â€œGot some Triangle Kush clear outta cali from HerbanLegands, I have to admit this stuff is bomby as hell! Pain, spams, Insomnia just melts away, I truly love this strain and hope more people keep trying this amaizngness! A+++ âœŒâ€

â€œAbsolutely perfect for night time stress relief. Terpenes are strong in this one. Opens my lungs up. Heavy as fuuuuuuck. Happy too. One of my favorites. Not for beginners. Its like cough syrup. You gotta stay awake lolâ€

â€œThis is a great purple Southern strain great for severe pain, anxiety, panic attacks also it's great for getting off of bullshit drugs your Doctor gave you then cut you off of because of the DEA, other than that I would quit every other strain but this one as a medical patient with anxiety and stomach pain.......â€
â€œI had the pleasure of experiencing Tk by the Jungle Boys from TLC dispensary in LA. Dense beautiful nugs grown to perfection with care. The high had me relaxed on cloud 9â€

â€œThis is some damn fine wine. It smells like sweet earth with notes of diesel and tropical fruit. The taste is slightly sour and very earthy. These are some plump, dense kush-looking nugs with tinges of purple. The high is relaxed but pronounced and focused. This stuff doesn't bring any of the anxiety that some of the sativa's have but has almost just as much euphoria. The body buzz is strong but relaxed. I think that...â€

â€œI had to get away from the never ending gloom of January in Indiana...I'm not kidding...weeks of no sun. So I guessed it was time to visit the brother in Florida. I got some of this very good strain while there. I went to a state park and hiked for a while, then I decided to sit along the banks of the river. I was admiring some ducks floating around and the next thing I know, BAM, two of them were snapped up by an al...â€

â€œWhere do I begin, this strain is an og and its from Florida, where it originated with the white (dank). This swampy og smell gets me relaxed and hungry, but I still do stuff. Hell why do you think rare darkness bx ghost og twice to make Scotts og, cause the mother TK is a perfect og. Tried the concentrate but the flower is what you should acquire.â€

â€œTasty is the first thing I have to say. Terpy Sauce to the face and right away my body relaxes. My PTSD gives me horrible mental and physical anxiety and those were both taken down a lot. The physical relaxation is a bit heavier than the mental relaxation this is a wonderful all around strain. Donâ€™t use to much or you will be tired but besides that itâ€™s truly a gift.â€
â€œPiney lemony terps heady asf defiantly a 5 star strainâ€
â€œMakes me very creative and Stoney baloney but high doesn't last that longâ€

â€œThe high builds slowly but hits you hard. Powerful. Relaxes me but with a little energy too, makes me creative and happy although not as euphoric as I expected. What I love about this strain is you can get high as fuck without being paranoid.â€

â€œNot sure if I got the real deal FL legend, but who cares, this stuff was some of stickiest tastiest kush I've ever come across. Calming heavy body high without drowsiness. Type of stuff that makes your arms feel a mile long and it might actually be impossible to be worried about anything after smoking this.â€
â€œearth and skunk flavors are very prominent. a relaxing buzz.â€
â€œThe hashy mines of this strain is crazy very sticky and a string aroma of straight kush hoping to find a bean or two of this for myselfâ€

â€œHoly holy very potent smelling and very strong in the chest and earthy diesel smell/taste by far the BEST wax I've tried tonight compared to the yeti og review and gorilla glue, Triangle kush is fantasticâ€

â€œIt takes the pain caused by spinal injury away but my knee injury pain. Not sure why..Mild couch lock. Dry eyes. 

Makes you feel happy and lets you destress and melts your worries away.

Lowered to 3 stars because causes me a headache when smoked in quantity.â€
â€œBody effects are great... euphoria mixed with fireworks on my skin". Great for relaxation and sex. That said
column4: we smoked a 27% and my friend had some psychotic symptoms
column5: which I think is due to it being a high percentage indica. Be careful and remember to drink lemonade / sprite or eat peppercorns if the high is too intense. :) Otherwise
column6: I would highly recommenced this strain.â€"

column3: â€œdat real....Florida flowers....â€

â€œPungent and aromatic out of the can, but not especially flavourful smoke. the head on the other hand is sweet and potent. Sent me instantly swimming in my head and chased away a nagging  neck ache after a long day of riding mountain Twisties with my bf..â€
â€œHelped so much with my headache.â€

â€œAmazing Indica. But I have seen different variations of this strain. If acquired from the right place the Buds are very crystalized but a looser form rather than tight,tight buds. Very Relaxing, excellent for anxiety & stress, as well as a social Indica. Great Strain over allâ€
â€œGood high, relaxing. I did get a slight headache every time I smoked, nothing too bad.â€

I liked it more than some of the other newer indica's I've tried to me lately. will try again if I catch a good batch again. helped with pain and relaxationâ€
â€œMy go to strain for creativity and brainstorming. Sometimes my imagination becomes so vivid that I can't focus on anything else. Love this strain.â€

â€œNow at Pennsylvania despensaries is Triangle Kush. Patients who have tried this flower say it makes you feel very uplifted and focused. Patients with conditions such as chronic pain, migraines,muscle spasms, tremors and glaucoma say this strain works best for. It has a spicy lemony citrus flavor with a smell thats spicy and earthy with a strong smell of lemon thats enjoyable.â€

â€œAn exceptional and vesatile indica strain. Amazing nutmeg flavour with cinnamon notes and smooth creamy finish. This is up lifting and clears my head in small amounts. In more moderate or large amounts this strain is relaxing and mellowing. Still clear headed. Warm and ...â€

â€œA really spacey heady high at first then a nice relaxing kind of energy afterwards. Tastes great and smells amazing but the smell is definitely pungent and skinky like the description says. Overall this is a good strain not really great for my needs but I still like it.â€

â€œThis strain was a very pleasant surprise for me as for whatever reason I wasn't expecting to enjoy it so much. Effects-wise it was also a perfect blend, relaxing stimulation from the Triangle and anti-anxiety/nausea from the O...â€

â€œVery enjoyable! Recommended by local dispsnsery and glad I took the advice. Initial feelings of happy and care free, followed by a nice sedation, a little heavy, wouldn't want to run errands, but still productive with work. Again, solid strain.â€

â€œTriangle Kush by Canna Organix out of Washington state Listed as a indica dominate hybrid. I had this in a clear concentrate that is injected on to the dab tool. THC is listed at 54% with an amazing CBG of 20% mind blowingly awesome.

Effect wise this is in my top three all time favorites not from the initial high, but for the effects that I experienced for three days afterwards. The initial high a clear focused ener...â€

â€œSmoked about a gram joint with my girlfriend and on the graves of all my lost pets; One of the best flavors. Even 3/4 of the way through it. Pretty harsh, skunky, and if you're not choking already , its got a sweet taste on the exhale. Within 5 minutes i could notice a heavy head buzz setting in,  followed by a nice relaxing full body high. It made me very focused and talkative. overall i loved this strainâ€

â€œNondescript, balanced, light/smooth stone. Clear-headed and introspective. Not euphoric" so much as just very content with things in general. Effects are gradual. Makes me want to mess around on a guitar and smoke cigarettes. I'm a fan for sure.â€"
